mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.model_name AS "modelName", a.model_id AS "modelId", a.fk_fans_id AS "fan.id", u.name AS "fan.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.fk_fans_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO focus( id, model_name, model_id, fk_fans_id, create_date, del_flag, create_by, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{modelName}, #{modelId}, #{fan.id}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE focus SET model_name = #{modelName}, model_id = #{modelId}, fk_fans_id = #{fan.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
